title: League of Legends | Evelynn Theme - Piano

embed.description: Hey guys, I was waiting for her login theme, but ended up freestyling her teaser, the piano there looked more interesting to play for me. :D I should probably organise my description... still dont know what really to say here :D Anyaway.. Chillowl guys.

body:
Evelynn Theme on Piano Everybody. :D
(please watch from YT tho..) 
Tell me your opinion on this, if you liked it or not.

replies.body: This is beautiful! I loved the piano melody in her teaser video so it's great to have more of it to listen to, and your rendition is killer {{champion:28}} . Thanks so much for sharing!
Do you have sheet music for this? It sounds awesome!
This gave me chills! I love the high point of the music about 3/4's in where it sounds like she's stalking her prey and chasing after them. Really cool!

Woah! 
Sounds really great! Give this man a cookie!
Piano sheet please! What a talented person you are *_* I am currently grade 7 ABRSM Piano and I still cannot "play" something just by hearing it....
Beautiful! I actually ~~watched~~ listened this with addblock off.

I love this, great job !

It was beautiful ! Your such a talented person
